item.title: Media Effect Estimation with Orbit's KTR Model
item.description: In this notebook we want to experiment to the new KTR model included in the new orbit’s release (1.1). In particular, we are interested in its applications to media effects estimation in the context of media mix modeling. This is one of the applications for the KTR model by the Uber’s team, see the corresponding paper Edwin, Ng, et al. “Bayesian Time Varying Coefficient Model with Applications to Marketing Mix Modeling”.
